com.aionemu.gameserver.model.gameobjects
Class Creature

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.gameserver.model.gameobjects.AionObject
      com.aionemu.gameserver.model.gameobjects.VisibleObject
          com.aionemu.gameserver.model.gameobjects.Creature
Direct Known Subclasses:
Npc, Player, Summon
public abstract class Creature
extends VisibleObject

This class is representing movable objects, its base class for all in game objects that may move

Author:
-Nemesiss-

getMaster

public Creature getMaster()
For summons and different kind of servants
it will return currently acting player.
This method is used for duel and enemy relations,
rewards

Returns:
Master of this creature or self

getActingCreature

public Creature getActingCreature()
For summons it will return summon object and for
servants - player object.
Used to find attackable target for npcs.

Returns:
acting master - player in case of servants
